name: sistema-editorial-juridico
description: Sistema Editorial Jurídico Supervisado - Estación de trabajo digital para producción de contenido jurídico con IA

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:serena"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.copy:frontend: rm -rf backend/dist/public && mkdir -p backend/dist/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/dist/public/ && echo '✅ Frontend copied successfully' && echo 'Frontend files:' && ls -lh backend/dist/public/assets/*.js | head -5
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.verify:build: test -f backend/dist/public/index.html && grep -q 'index-.*\.js' backend/dist/public/index.html && echo '✅ Build verification passed' || (echo '❌ Build verification failed!' && exit 1)

author: Editorial Jurídico Team
